previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 2, LA Galaxy 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A high-profile match is ahead when Sporting Kansas City play host to the LA Galaxy on Saturday evening at Sporting Park before an ESPN2 audience.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs. LA Galaxy

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Game time. #SKCvLA on ESPN 2. Let's get to it: http://t.co/OvQ7JvDeNw

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Alineación @SportingKC | Gruenebaum; Igor Juliao, Collin, Besler, Sinovic; Olum, Feilhaber, Zusi; Toni, Dwyer, Saad #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: We're underway. #SKCvLA http://t.co/5JCuCDJdhs

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: We're underway. #SKCvLA http://t.co/5JCuCDJdhs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, LA Galaxy 0. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) from a free kick with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Benny Feilhaber rips it in with an amazing free kick

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 10' Sarvas fouls Saad right on the edge of the box and #SportingKC has a dangerous free kick opportunity 20 yards from goal. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: More tough defending for #LAGalaxy. Juninho with a foul just outside the sporting penalty area. Dangerous for LA.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!!! BENNY!!!!

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 10' GOAL SPORTING. Too easy there from Benny Feilhaber who places it effortlessly into the back of the net past a helpless Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber drives home a direct kick in the 11th minute. #SportingKC leads 1-0.

timelineItems.name: Juicy Dre
timelineItems.text: What a beautiful free kick. Getting it up and over that wall. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Scott McSpadden
timelineItems.text: WE BELIEVE!! #SportingKC #STMCapsule . This is how we #LIVEKC !!!

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOLAZO! (10') | Benny Feilhaber abre el marcador con un tiro libre de pierna derecha al ángulo superior derecho. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steven J. Camargo
timelineItems.text: Feilhaber! Wonder strike. Glad to see him in fine form. Still go LA! #SKCvsLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Aaron Childers
timelineItems.text: “@RobbHeineman: Anyone that doesnt think #sportingkc can develop world class players for the #usmnt can.....” Kiss our ass!

timelineItems.name: Clara Gabelmann
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC http://t.co/7t0ZzHj06Z

timelineItems.name: Clara Gabelmann
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC http://t.co/7t0ZzHj06Z

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text:
#SKCvLA By The Numbers: The #LAGalaxy take on Sporting KC in a matchup of the winners of the last 3 @MLS Cups. 
Any score predictions?

timelineItems.name: TayTay✌
timelineItems.text: Just witnessed a soldier surprise his family at the #SportingKC game! �����

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Records when scoring first: @SportingKC 9-0-4, @LAGalaxy 7-0-3 Records when conceding first: Sporting KC 7-0-3, LA Galaxy 0-3-3 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 12 - There have been 12 red cards issued combined in SKC’s last 16 #MLS games (5 to SKC). Battles. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: #SKCvLA this is going to be a blast. @MLS only gets better

timelineItems.name: Herb Scribner
timelineItems.text: More soccer action to come. #SKCvLA to follow up #SEAvTOT on ESPN2. Soccer all day.

timelineItems.name: Adam Delich
timelineItems.text: Besler and Zusi are in KC for 4 more years ❤️. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: #SKCvLA will kick off at 5:15pm CT. Watch the match on ESPN2 or listen on @SportsRadio810 / La Gran D 1340! #MLS

timelineItems.name: Kevin McGinnis
timelineItems.text: Congrats @RobbHeineman we're proud of what you're doing for #KansasCity! #LiveKC #SportingKC #KeepBuilding #GSD

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Nearing kickoff here @SportingPark. It's a marquee @MLS matchup as SKC and LA look to gain ground in the Supporters Shield race. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @SportingKC video board had @LAGalaxy midfielder Landon Donovan listed as being from Ontario, Canada. Oops or gamesmanship? #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Alex Tawney
timelineItems.text: Two of MLS's best players staying in MLS, because they WANTED to. It's not up to us what is/isn't good for them. #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tuttle
timelineItems.text: Coincidence that @EnergyFC & parent club @SportingKC are playing @LAGalaxy on the same day? #UseYourEnergy #SKC #OKC #GameDay

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Paul Freelend
timelineItems.text: Wow, that Feilhaber guy is pretty good. Maybe someone should give him a shot at the national team? #SKC #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy have conceded 15 goals this season and five of them have come on set pieces. Damning statistic. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Alex Tawney
timelineItems.text: This is fantastic for the league and Sporting. I'm ecstatic! #MLS #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: You can listen to a free audio stream of #SKCvLA with @JoeTutino here: http://t.co/N3xD8R2XHz

timelineItems.name: #USMNT
timelineItems.text: “@SportingKC: DONE DEAL! #SportingKC re-signs @mbesler and @gzusi to Designated Player contracts." Statement.

timelineItems.name: Pat Guldenpfennig
timelineItems.text: My two favorite teams facing each other. And I have to do this more often when Sporting moves to the West? Ugh! #SKC #LAGalaxy #MLS

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Both sides are on the pitch, LA in all white and @SportingKC in those magnificent horizontally-striped indigo kits. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Carson Wells
timelineItems.text: Let's gooo #Skc http://t.co/mVARPuWmna

timelineItems.name: Carson Wells
timelineItems.text: Let's gooo #Skc http://t.co/mVARPuWmna

timelineItems.name: Eric Schmitz
timelineItems.text: Sporting Kansas City's kits are top notch. Fantastic. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 13' Saad charges forward from the left, cuts into the middle and his shot is blocked out for a corner kick. Zusi to take... #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: GOAL @SportingKC! Benny Feilhaber with a magisterial free-kick that rockets over the @LAGalaxy wall. Oh my. Beautiful strike. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure that the ESPN commentators had dinner because they're using a lot of food words. "Delicious" "Tasty" #SKCvLA #skc

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: There's still plenty of time in the match. Just calm down defensively and get more of the ball. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.name: Herb Scribner
timelineItems.text: Still getting used to seeing Zusi in a SKC jersey again. But he's played well today so far. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Kofi Opare.

timelineItems.name: Rob Robertson
timelineItems.text: The first 15 mins have been like attack vs defence, are Keane & Donovan even playing?? @SportingKC #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: [Twidwell]
timelineItems.text: I think we now know why Besler signed with @SportingKC long term... #SKC http://t.co/jfNmRvDOJ1

timelineItems.name: [Twidwell]
timelineItems.text: I think we now know why Besler signed with @SportingKC long term... #SKC http://t.co/jfNmRvDOJ1

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 16' Dwyer takes on Opare and wins another corner near the left endline. @SportingKC in complete control thus far... #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Dollens
timelineItems.text: Was looking for a #MLS club to follow post World Cup and I found it #SportingKC until #IndyEleven join the #MLS Good luck tonight both teams

timelineItems.name: Israel Wasserstein
timelineItems.text: Weird having national commentators praise a KC team as a model franchise. But awesome and fully deserved. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Seth Sinovic tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday evening match between Sporting KC and the LA Galaxy. Watch it on ESPN2 kicking off at 6pm ET.
timelineItems.title: Sporting KC vs. LA Galaxy July 19, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Lance
timelineItems.text: Good MLS game on between Sporting KC and L.A. Galaxy. Lets go #SKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: A good goal celebration from @b_feilhaber22, by the way. He went to the @SportingKC bench and tossed chalk into the air, a la @KingJames.

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday evening match between Sporting KC and the LA Galaxy. Watch it on ESPN2 kicking off at 6pm ET.
timelineItems.title: Sporting KC vs. LA Galaxy July 19, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Mark Reedy
timelineItems.text: Alright. Yard work done. Shower beer consumed. Time for #SKC the one KC team that DOESN’T constantly let me down.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 1' Saad flashes a low cross into Dom Dwyer from the left wing, but the Englishman can't quite connect from the penalty spot. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Alineación @LAGalaxy | Penedo; DeLaGarza, Leonardo, Opare, Meyer; Juninho, Husidic, Sarvas, Donovan; Zardes, Keane. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, LA Galaxy 1.

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: Wooooooo! 3 points! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME! That's three wins on the trot for @SportingKC, who go four points clear atop the East with a 2-1 win over @LAGalaxy! #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin
timelineItems.text: APPARENTLY whopping players FLAT only deserves a Yellow!!! WTFever!!! That is Benny who got knocked down. I don't think I could play soccer. I would deck people too much. #sportingkc

timelineItems.desc: A high-profile match when Sporting Kansas City played host to the LA Galaxy on Saturday evening at Sporting Park before an ESPN2 audience.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting Kansas City vs. LA Galaxy | July 19, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Sergeant surprises + reunites with family before #SKCvLA: http://t.co/5MDie4ZDzR http://t.co/cSkJNr00ok

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Sergeant surprises + reunites with family before #SKCvLA: http://t.co/5MDie4ZDzR http://t.co/cSkJNr00ok

timelineItems.name: DeeAnne Heatherton
timelineItems.text: Looks like we got the old Zardes today. So sad. I was getting to like the new version. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Dave Borchardt
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC putting on a clinic here in the first 20 minutes. Hope they can keep the pedal to the metal...

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 22' @SportingKC spreading the ball comfortably around the attacking half. White shirts doing a lot of chasing at the moment. 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Nate Brinson
timelineItems.text: I have always wanted to see Zusi and Feilhaber in midfield together consistently. #SportingKC #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Sporting keeping the ball incredibly well so far. LA essentially just chasing the game right now. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 22' Good bit of hold-up play from Zardes, who receives a through ball from Juninho and waits for support near the center circle.

timelineItems.name: Sean Monaghan
timelineItems.text: Two totally different players who player two totally different positions, but I rate Feilhaber higher than Zusi. #MLS #SKC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #SKC putting on a clinic through 20+ mins. #LAGalaxy hardly making any strides in KC territory - Feilhaber FK one for highlight reel #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: @Da_Real_Marifke Of course. We’re the most handsome team in @MLS.

timelineItems.name: Kirun
timelineItems.text: 2 observations--1. this SKC team are fun. 2. Those #SKC uniforms are SO RIDICULOUSLY FLY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 25' Incisive attack from LA as Donovan finds Husidic with space on the left side of the box, but Gruenebaum snuffs out a low cross. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Best chance so far for LA, but Husidic with either a bad shot or a bad pass, and the possession snuffs it.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Shot Husidic! Nice buildup from the #LAGalaxy but Gruenebaum is able to make the save. Still 1-0. http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC DOES NOT play in Kansas City, Missouri! They play in Kansas City, Kansas!! They actually moved out of Missouri. I hate them.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Matt Besler tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Wait, three of the five "set piece" goals the #lagalaxy have given up this season were penalties. What are we on about? @LAGalaxyInsider

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 28' Donovan is fouled with his back to goal and LA has a free kick 40 yards from goal.

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Center forwards back defending hard on set pieces. That's what Vermes likes to see.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 28' Donovan sends a free kick into the penalty area and Dom Dwyer rises high for a solid defensive header. 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Always fun to watch two teams who like to open up a match.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Moments like that make me unsure about Dwyer. I mean, he has to at least make contact, right? #SKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: .@KingJames meet King Benny #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Eric Smith
timelineItems.text: Cauldron life. #SKCvLA #ibtwww http://t.co/gdhzUagEK9

timelineItems.name: Eric Smith
timelineItems.text: Cauldron life. #SKCvLA #ibtwww http://t.co/gdhzUagEK9

timelineItems.name: Zack Pfister
timelineItems.text: The amount of stupidity from #eurosnobs is always amusing, tell me about improving play through spot starts. #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jaime Penedo leaps and dives for well-placed blast from Soony Saad

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Silly foul by AJD there. Could have been a booking on first glance. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Every young guy who's good on the ball has to learn that there's such a thing as "too cute" sometimes.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 30' DeLaGarza barges into Juliao and a foul is called. Zusi takes the free kick short with a quick restart.

timelineItems.name: Nyghtewynd
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane keeps trying to complain the ball into the net. I don't think it's going to work. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jaime Penedo.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 32' We all know Saad has a wicked pair of shooting boots, and he forces a fine save from Penedo with a low, left-footed drive from 20 yards.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Remember those mean guys who stole your hat in grade school and kept throwing it around to each other? That's Sporting with the ball.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: SAVE Penedo! Quick reaction stop by JP after Saad gets by Meyer. Sporting with a corner.

timelineItems.name: dave78pdx™
timelineItems.text: Props to #SKC for signing Zusi and Besler to DP contracts. We need an American soccer league with American stars. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @LAGConfidential @John_Infante Defending/Goalkeeping an issue with the team. Clear and evident given what occurred on the Feilhaber goal.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Tommy Meyer.
Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Notty Manager
timelineItems.text: 34: Shot by #SKC. The home side are in front and are pushing to get an unanswered two goal lead in this first half.

timelineItems.name: brad
timelineItems.text: Donovan is just strolling round the pitch, this is good news. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Kofi Opare (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Hand ball by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: J. Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane is not happy with his team's decision to not push up. Also, wasn't very happy w Donovan on earlier pass miss. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Evan Ream
timelineItems.text: No British player has ever won the MLS Golden Boot. Two Englishmen are currently on top of the charts #RBNY #SKC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: AJD gets a talking to from the head ref. I get his frustration, but calm down man. We need you locked in today. #LAGalaxy #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Juninho (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy passes to the center. Back to the wing. Back to the center. Center holds it. Holds it. http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 37' #LAGalaxy switch to a straight 4-4-2: Donovan/Keane now up top with Zardes on the right flank.

timelineItems.name: Statbunker.com
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #SKC #SKCvLA When LA concede 1st they have a 9.5% win rate (W2,D6,L13) on the road it is 0% (W0,D4,L9).(last 50 gms) Clutching

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 37' Meyer plays to the on-running Zardes down the right sideline, and Besler does well to slide tackle and force a throw-in. 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Andreas Haukas
timelineItems.text: So where are all those 'Donovan for USMNT' ppl? Absolutely anonymous and his team is losing. #SKCvLA #trustJurgen

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: I'm not sure the diamond experiment is worth the time anymore for #LAGalaxy. Looks like they've switched back to the 4-4-2. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Cody Worsham
timelineItems.text: Tommy Meyer making Zusi look like Yedlin. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: The rotating parts just didn't work. Versitile midfield, but no true pure wingers. Injuries at fullback didn't help. #LAGalaxy #Diamond

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Gonzales
timelineItems.text: Pull yourselves together @LAGalaxy and make those runs.. I'm looking at you fullbacks! Thank you. #SKCvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: A #SportingKC win helps my boys #RSL in the Western Conference playoff race BUT I hate Kansas so much I want the #LAGalaxy to win.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 40' Meyer makes his way down the right and flashes in a low cross near the right corner flag. Besler hammers out for a corner. 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: The diamond wasn't going to work today considering the support from fullback (or lack there of). #LAGalaxy #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Dwyer pretty much killing it in the defensive third today.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 41' Excellent defensive work from Dom Dwyer. First he heads away the corner kick, then rushes out to block Husidic's shot. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marcelo Sarvas launches it too high from distance

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Meyer and AJD are playing out of position. I'd have gone with RR at LB, AJD at RB. Meyer isn't in a position to succeed. #SKCvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Lifeless display from #lagalaxy so far. Zero shots. #skc owning possession. 14% of all possessions in zone 14. #skcvlag

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Benny is on fire this week. Check out his free kick: http://t.co/PSohH0mOjz #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: I have said and will keep saying that Feilhaber should have at least been on the prelim roster for Brazil. Playing out of his mind. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Better chances starting to come for LA after switch from diamond to 4-4-2.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 42' LA beginning to work their way into the match after SKC's early onslaught. Sarvas thunders a long range effort narrowly over the bar.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 43' After a frantic start, the #LAGalaxy starting to find more space to create after the formation switch. Chances coming.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Reid Day
timelineItems.text: Besler can play that diagonal D to MF/F ball so well, it's a crucial ball but difficult to master at any level. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: World Breaking News
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy passes to the center. Back to the wing. Back to the center. Center holds it. Holds it. #SKCvLA http://t.co/08xqsBfxIr

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy not linking up with Robbie Keane. LA not doing much with the ball. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT: The #LAGalaxy find themselves down 1-0 but there’s still 45 left to play: http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SCKvLA http://t.co/56oadYOb0M

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT: The #LAGalaxy find themselves down 1-0 but there’s still 45 left to play: http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SCKvLA http://t.co/56oadYOb0M

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: SKC_Fan97
timelineItems.text: Half time in Kansas City and @b_feilhaber22 beauty of a free kick goal is the difference #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Alexis Marrufo
timelineItems.text: Good first half #SportingKC http://t.co/z7GIQjNGA7

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: I would keep Donovan up top. GZ not getting enough chances to be dangerous and isn't the best at creating opportunities for himself #skcvla

timelineItems.name: Alexis Marrufo
timelineItems.text: Good first half #SportingKC http://t.co/z7GIQjNGA7

timelineItems.name: Caleb Santos

timelineItems.name: annesimmons
timelineItems.text: Good seats �⚽️❤️ #sportingkc #lagalaxy #vscocam

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: LA struggling offensively. Donovan not sharp at all. Zardes & Keane have 0 shots. The two combined for 7 shots & 4 goals 3 days ago. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: David Cain
timelineItems.text: Shocked to see possession stat at 50/50 and LA with more completed passes. Really didn't feel like it. #SKC

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: I spent all first half arguing about defense that I didn't get to mention the #lagalaxy midfield being completely overrun

timelineItems.name: dfulton426
timelineItems.text: I know it isnt man crush monday but daaaaamn. #zusi #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Collin added to ASG roster, but don't see Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Why is Landon Donovan playing at the top of the diamond? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Mike Kuhn
timelineItems.text: I will say if Dom & Benny are on the All-Star reserves and still get their bonus I won't be upset. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @GalaxyPodcast @Ben_Jata He's not playing there anymore. Better outwide IMO, but I get why they're putting him up top w/ GZ providing width

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 1, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.desc: Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box.
timelineItems.title: MISS: After a valiant attempt from Landon Donovan, Baggio Husidic rockets it wide

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 46' Back underway @SportingPark. The home side will defend the @KCCauldron end for the final 45 minutes. 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Kofi Opare (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Second half begins. Gruenebaum has friendly Cauldron at his back for the first time in a league match.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: The #SKCvLA second half has kicked off at @SportingPark! Head over to ESPN2 or listen on @SportsRadio810! http://t.co/o1PNHtOImD

timelineItems.comment: Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: One halftime sub for @SportingKC: @ToniDovale9 is replaced by @jacob__peterson, who makes his 200th career @MLS appearance. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: We've also got a halftime sub as @jacob__peterson comes on for @ToniDovale9 at the break #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Scott Beck
timelineItems.text: Congrats to @gzusi, @mbesler, @ampC2 for making the MLS All-Stars but @Ddwyer14 should be there too! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Peterson for Dovale. Grit upgrade for Sporting.

timelineItems.desc: Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) crosses the ball, but it nobody receives it.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Graham Zusi quickly approaches goal and sends a cross, but there is nobody there to capitalize

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer has scored 14 goals this year. The rest of #SKC: 12 combined. Should be going to #MLSAllStar game.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Aurélien Collin.
Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Matt Besler with a cross.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Good start for #LAGalaxy, but Husidic just wide of the near post. Gs look ready to make this a game in the 2nd half. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Andy Gruenebaum terrific stop on an incoming Gyasi Zardes

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Igor Juliao (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jaime Penedo fast reflexes too good for Igor Juliao

timelineItems.desc: Instant Replay of Jaime Penedo save on Igor Juliao shot.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Jaime Penedo leaps for Igor Juliao strike

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas.

timelineItems.name: SKC_Fan97
timelineItems.text: Zusi slides the ball in front of the net but no one is there to put it home #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 49' Zusi does wonderfully to skip past Meyer and square it across the face of goal, but no one is there to supply the finishing touch!

timelineItems.name: David Jamison
timelineItems.text: @KCCauldron watching game on tv today. Stadium too quiet. Need your leadership to bring it rest of stadium up a notch #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Tony Felich
timelineItems.text: Wake up @SportingKC !!! @gbaum30 saved us twice. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: I really prefer letting Gyasi Zardes make forward runs from mid. Lets him pick up speed and forces defenders to make tough choices #skcvla

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 51' Juliao showing excellent pace and skill as he cuts past multiple defenders before his through ball to Dwyer is cut out by Penedo.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 3 bad turn overs in less than 5 minutes for #LAGalaxy. Not a great sign. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Robbie Keane rushes up empty field, but collides with Andy Gruenebaum

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Tommy Meyer.

timelineItems.name: Geezy
timelineItems.text: Got some great exposure to the #MLS today. Caught the Sounder / Hotspur draw and am plugged in to this #SKCvLA.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Zardes might be able to blow your mind with his attack but his defense is terrible #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Rest of MLS just realized: "Oh, crap. Three and a half more years of the Mattapult."

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Juninho following a fast break.
Delay in match Andy Gruenebaum (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Achtung! Millwall
timelineItems.text: Keane you old fraud. Just missed a sitter there son #mls #lagalaxy turn it in mate, past it ...

timelineItems.name: Ciarán McInerney
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy Purge was so bad that I wrote to the director to give me back the 90mins of my life he wasted

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: JUST OVER FROM KEANO! Juninho plays Robbie through on goal but Keane can’t keep his shot down! So. Close. http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Kristopher McDonald
timelineItems.text: People watching on TV. Did Donovan not just blow up Benny? Foul? #SKCvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Marcelo Sarvas sends it too high from center

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane wanted a foul there on that challenge by Gruenebaum. He and Chapman are not friends right now. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: SOSARams Fan
timelineItems.text: Brutal play by Feilhaber there. #SportingKC #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 54' Keane is played through on goal, but Gruenebaum comes off his line to alter a shot that sails just over the crossbar! 1-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Keeper didn't get the ball, got there late, made contact, and endangered Keane's safety. That's a straight red. #LAGalaxy #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: This is super easy to say from behind my computer not having run at all today, but Keane should have dribbled around #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Andrea Chapman
timelineItems.text: Juninho and Keane on a break, the pass to Keane didn't have enough pace and the Gruenebaum makes contact with Keane after the shot. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: Duffy
timelineItems.text: I'm loving the effort of Andy Gruenebaum for @SportingKC tonight!!! This man can flat out play!!! #SportingKC

Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: B Roble
timelineItems.text: The difference in quality between those who went to #WorldCup2014 and those who didn't is significant. Long road ahead #ussoccer #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Sarvas wins a free kick. #LAGalaxy need to build something. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Graham Zusi.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Baggio Husidic.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Donovan gets swiped from behind. That's a yellow card chapman? Seriously. Do your job. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 2, LA Galaxy 0. Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Lawrence Olum magnificently heads it in during difficult play

timelineItems.name: Pamela Joseph
timelineItems.text: Little Landon does not approve of that foul. #landon #lagalaxy #LAvSKC http://t.co/hUKmqH1OvL

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Fast fact: the last time LA allowed a goal in the first 15 min. of an @MLS regular season game was August 2012, a span of 60 games. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: All four Galaxy fans in attendance unhappy with that corner kick call.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Baggio Husidic.
Attempt saved. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: SKC_Fan97
timelineItems.text: Zusi can't keep the ball in but they get a corner #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Before today's match, the #lagalaxy had gone 60 #MLS regular season games without conceding a goal in the first 15 minutes.

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! OLUM!!!

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Make it 2-0. Lawrence Olum nods in @SportingKC's second of the match. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Nabae Asfar
timelineItems.text: What a save!! But KC head in the rebound. Nothing the keeper could do about that one! Made an amazing initial save tho. 2-0 now #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: the_norman_life
timelineItems.text: goal scored by #13 Lawrence Olum for @SportingKC now the score is 2-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.desc: Offside, LA Galaxy. Robbie Keane tries a through ball, but Gyasi Zardes is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: OFFSIDE: Gyasi Zardes moves swiftly on goal wiith great field position, but is cought too far up

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 62' Zusi flashed in a corner, Peterson's header was blocked onto the crossbar, and Olum was there to nod home from close range! 2-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (61') | Lawrence Olum aumenta la cuenta luego de un rebote que dejó Jaime Penedo con una gran primera atajada. #SKCvLA 2-0

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Robbie Keane tries a through ball, but Gyasi Zardes is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Lawrence Olum has more goals in this match than the entire Galaxy XI.

timelineItems.desc: Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: CROSSBAR: Robbie Keane approaches on goal with great momentum, but fires it just high

timelineItems.name: Bandon Decker
timelineItems.text: Keane is either unaware of the laws of football or thinks his team should be allowed to break them at will. Guessing the latter. #SKC

timelineItems.name: John Dale
timelineItems.text: Looking forward to hearing what exactly Bruce Arena complains about after the #SKCvLA game

timelineItems.name: Christian Calderon
timelineItems.text: #Sportingkc #sportinggame

timelineItems.text: OFF THE BAR. Keane rattles the cross bar with a chance after two Galaxy chances were negated for offside.

timelineItems.text: KEANE OFF THE CROSSBAR! This game is bonkers. http://t.co/71lwLRdds5 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.text: Leonardo collides with an SKC player. Good on Chapman to stop the match. MLS refs have done a great job with head injuries. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.text: Second sub for #SportingKC as @BigAfrika88 comes on for @SoonySaad in the 73rd minute #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Steven Stoehr
timelineItems.text: Nothing wrong with that, he's a phenomenal complimentary piece but needs a certain level of quality around him. #SKC #NERevs

Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Juicy Dre
timelineItems.text: The youngster is in the match. Let’s see what Bradford’s got. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.text: This match is a perfect example of how much of a game changer scoring from set pieces can be. It's an element #lagalaxy haven't had

timelineItems.name: Chris Lemus
timelineItems.text: Former #USF #Bulls soccer player & current #SportingKC forward Dom Dwyer snubbed from #MLS all-star game despite being 2nd in goals (14).

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Bradford Jamieson IV is making his MLS debut. Put this one in the scrap book. #LAGalaxy #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 77' Zusi curls in a 30-yard free kick from the right side and Collin is flagged offside. 2-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Dominic Dwyer.

timelineItems.name: Ad Astra SKC
timelineItems.text: Today's attendance 21,493. Past attendance record at @SportingPark was 21,304 last August versus NYRB #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: That goal sure was swell! #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: YES KEANEEE!!! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Anthony Cappel
timelineItems.text: Watching MLS isn't to bad, #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Kofi Opare (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 79' @LAGalaxy grabs a goal back. Robbie Keane slots home following a corner kick that SKC failed to clear. 2-1 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Nabae Asfar
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane finally finds the back of the net! Galaxy creeping up now, down just 2-1 with just over 10 minutes to go. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Keano pulls one back. Ten minutes left for @LAGalaxy to find the equalizer. 2-1. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Leonardo (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 2-1 @LAGALAXY GOAL! Bradford Jamieson IV with the flick on finds KEANE who pulls LA within one. Immediate impact from the HGP. #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOAAAAAAAALLLLL ROBBIE KEANE! 2-1! What an assist from 17-year-old Bradford Jamieson IV! #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: That's Keane's 10th goal of the season and Zardes' second assist. Kane now fifth in the @MLS Golden Boot race.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (79') | Robbie Keane descuenta y le aumenta el ritmo al partido. #SKCvLA 2-1

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile in the other match I'm watching, #LAGalaxy pull one back against #SportingKC via Robbie Keane. Interesting 10+ minutes ahead.

timelineItems.text: 9' A strong start for the hosts, who have already unleashed four shots against a team that only allows around 11 per game. 0-0 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: score should be 3-1 or 4-1 in favor of #SKC, so many chances spurned, game far closer at 2-1 than it should be, #LAG have not been that good

timelineItems.text: Not pleased. #SKCvLA http://t.co/jK9Kkoi4TM

timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer makes me believe in goals like nobody I've watched in Kansas City. #SportingKC

timelineItems.text: Everything that wasn't a fouls in the first 85' is now a foul. Got it. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: @ZsaZsaWombat I think he got bumped by his defender. Comedy of errors. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 90+3' Opare gets his head to the free kick but it directs out of play and SKC will have a goal kick. Not long left... 2-1 #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Heath Edwards
timelineItems.text: Needed that insurance goal after all. Galaxy scored once late, but @SportingKC holds on for 3 points! #SKCvLA

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy loses this game, but definitely still in contention for Worst Hair in the MLS. #SportingKC #SKCvLA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, LA Galaxy 1.
